name: Judgement Day
overview: was inspired by the arcade and Atari 2600 game Canyon Bomber from 1978. You are a fighter pilot who drops bombs on tall skyscrapers. Each time your plane reaches the right side of the screen, it reappears on the left, with a slightly lower flight altitude. You have to prioritize targets and destroy the tallest skyscrapers before you crash into one of them. In Judgement Day, matters are further complicated by persons shooting at you from ground level. To avoid being hit, you have the ability to slow down or speed up your plane. After Centuries of Anticipation it is Finally here "JUDGEMENT DAY" but is it the Beginning or the En The Decision is Yours The year is 1999 The world is in the clutches of evil mafia boss Marcus Bellini. With one rule OBEY, and one penalty DEATH, even the world council are powerless to stop him. But in a desperate attempt to regain control of the planet they enlist a team of crack fighter pilots, with you as their commander. Your mission is to journey deep into the heart of Bellini's massive empire and seek out the dominators and kill them, utterly destroying every inch of Bellini's bloody kingdom, ending in the death of Bellini himself, and so ending his reign of terror and building a new destiny for mankind.
